amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for programs under the Violence Against Women Act by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Violence Against Women Act by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
